duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell merchant services offerings to businesses through face to face meetings, telephone communications, and marketing programs.
Identify revenue opportunities and prospective clients within assigned territories.
Conduct face to face meetings with prospects, qualify leads, and drive them through the sales pipeline.
Respond to customer requests for information, give online presentations, and close additional product and/or service sales with existing clients.
Manage client relationships and expectations during the sales cycle.
Maintain client records, call notes, and relevant information in the Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system.
Develop and maintain in-depth knowledge of current product/service portfolio and changes within the payments industry.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in relevant field or equivalent experience
6+ years of relevant experience in sales
